treatment.description: Leaves usually 1.5–6 mm wide, rarely wider. Fruiting bracteoles 2(–4)-winged, samaralike; achenes vertical. 2n = 18.
treatment.habitat: fine-textured, often saline and seleniferous substrates
treatment.discussion: Zuckia brandegeei var. brandegeei is found on the Entrada, Summerville, Morrison, Moenkopi, Chinle, Shinarump/Mossback, and Cutler formations.
